resources.string: The created track did not contain any measurements
This feature helps us to reproduce unexpected behavior or program crashes. When sending in the Log file of the enviroCar app you help to improve it.

This feature uses the default \"Send To\" mechanism. If you invoke it with your Email client, you can easily send the report via email. If you do not have an Email client installed, you can save the log file on a PC, e.g. through Bluetooth or USB. In such cases we appreciate sending in the reporting bundle manually. It is stored at the following location:
The enviroCar app was not able to establish the bluetooth connection to the OBD-II adapter. You could try to unplug and plug the adapter, then restart measurements.
General Track Error - Please report this issue
*This is a GPS based track. It cannot be uploaded to the open data.
Sign in to upload your tracks
How much have you travelled in the past month? How much fuel does your car consume on each trip?
enviroCar offers a variety of interactive analysis and visualisation tools, map products and APIs to answer these and similar questions.
Contribute your data to research studies. Help to jointly optimize the traffic flow and make mobility more sustainable
Upload your recorded tracks to help enrich the enviroCar community data store. enviroCar provides free and open access to the the community\'s anonymized tracks.
There is already a user signed in. Do you want to go to your Dashboard?

Timestamps are automatically included in the logs. Sending us reports helps us reproduce unexpected behavior or crashes. This makes enviroCar better and more stable. Click the send button below to email this report to us.

This feature uses the default \"Send To\" mechanism. If you invoke it with your Email client, you can easily send the report via email. If you do not have an Email client installed, you can save the log file on a PC, e.g. through Bluetooth or USB. \n\nIn such cases we appreciate sending in the reporting bundle manually. They are stored at the following locations:

string-array.item: Component does not work as expected

resources.string: If you need help connecting to the OBD Adapter, press the info icon in the toolbar
